channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: America's new top health diplomat has strong opinions on abortion and gender
item.description: Bethany Kozma leads a key global health office at the Department of Health and Human Services. In past experience in the public eye, she's campaigned ...

item.title: Brown University shooting suspect found dead. And Epstein files release deadline looms
item.description: The man suspected of fatally shooting two students at Brown University has been found dead. And, today is the Justice Department's deadline to release...

item.title: Millions of soon-to-be uninsured Americans are looking for a 'plan B'
item.description: In January, millions of Americans will face more costly premiums on their ACA health plans. Some will go without insurance, pay out of pocket to see d...

item.title: 4 common scams to watch out for this holiday season
item.description: Don't get swindled while buying those last-minute gifts. Amy Nofziger, a fraud specialist with AARP, shares top schemes she's been seeing this season ...

item.title: Cheddar bay biscuits, cheap margs and memories: Readers share their nostalgia for chain restaurants
item.description: Americans have deep nostalgia, and love, for America's chain restaurants. Why? We asked and more than 150 readers answered.

item.title: American Airlines stops offering miles for basic economy fares
item.description: Members of the carrier's AAdvantage loyalty program no longer earn miles or status points when purchasing a basic ticket.

item.title: UN-backed experts say Gaza food supplies improving but 100,000 still in 'catastrophic conditions'
item.description: Israel says the report "doesn't reflect the reality" and ignores the volume of aid entering the Gaza Strip.

item.title: How to get a mortgage rate in the 5% range for 2026
item.description: Mortgage interest rates have considerably declined in 2025. Here's how to get one in the 5% range for 2026.

item.title: Man suspected in Brown University shooting and MIT professor’s killing is found dead, officials say
item.description: Officials say a man who is suspected in last weekend’s mass shooting at Brown University and in the fatal shooting of a Massachusetts Institute of Tec...

item.title: Noem says Brown suspect got U.S. visa through diversity lottery, pauses program
item.description: Secretary of Homeland Security Kristi Noem says the Trump administration will pause the diversity visa lottery program, which she said was used by Bro...

item.title: EU agrees €90bn loan for Ukraine but without using Russian assets
item.description: EU leaders said the loan would be repayable only when Russia paid reparations for the war.

item.title: Norway's crown princess likely needs lung transplant, palace says
item.description: Mette-Marit has pulmonary fibrosis, a disease that stiffens the lungs, making it hard to breathe.

item.title: Justice Department set to release trove of Epstein files today
item.description: The Justice Department expects to release "several hundred thousand" records from the Epstein files today, a top official said. Follow live updates he...

item.title: South Africa defiant after US threatens 'consequences' over refugee centre raid
item.description: South Africa has accused the US of employing Kenyans without work permits to process refugee applications.

item.title: Uganda prison officer sacked for 'politicking' on TikTok
item.description: Ugandan law requires public servants to remain politically neutral and bars them from active politics.

item.title: Ex-special counsel Jack Smith's lawyers re-up call for him to testify publicly
item.description: Jack Smith, who oversaw two investigations into President Trump, appeared before the House Judiciary Committee for a closed-door deposition Wednesday.

item.title: Trump suspends green card lottery program that let Brown University, MIT shootings suspect into US
How 1 anonymous tipster cracked the Brown University shooting case
